1.text: This is a password strength meter — but with a twist. We've added a layer of gamification to make learning about password security not just informative, but fun!

2.text: Our goal is to help users build better, stronger, and more secure passwords in an engaging and memorable way.

3.text: Password strength meters are a helpful tool on the web, offering users a visual guide to how secure their passwords are.

4.text: We wanted to take that concept further — to create an interactive space where users can explore, learn, and understand not only why strong passwords matter, but also how to create ones that are both secure and easy to remember.

5.text: And what better way to do that than with a game?

6.text: Games are a powerful way to learn. They invite curiosity, encourage experimentation, and make complex ideas easier to grasp. With Password Pet, we wanted to design a playful experience — a safe, judgment-free space where users can test their password skills, get real-time feedback, and even have a little companion along the way.

7.text: In the end, our goal was simple: to develop a tool that guides users on their journey to better password habits.

8.text: Whether you win or lose, the most important thing is to learn something new — and leave better prepared to stay safe out there on the web.

9.text: Enjoy the journey, and stay vigilant.
